verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:6
verses.text: Lest the avenger of the blood pursue the slayer, while his heart is hot, and overtake him, because the way is long, and slay him; whereas he was not worthy of death, inasmuch as he hated him not in time past.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:7
verses.text: Wherefore I command thee, saying, Thou shalt separate three cities for thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:8
verses.text: And if the Lord thy God enlarge thy coast, as he hath sworn unto thy fathers, and give thee all the land which he promised to give unto thy fathers;
